issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. Install and launch KS
2. Go to Base UI > Menu(Android) > Basic Menu

Actual result:
Table view color flickers and become light grey with white text

Expected result:
no flickering

Note: not a regression: occurs in 3.1.0.GA
fields.summary: Android: Menu (Android) - Basic Menu - table view color flickering
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201305181057
SDK, billd: 3.1.1.v20130520171545
Devices:
Nexus 7 Android version: 4.2
GalaxyS3 Android version: 4.0.4

comments.body: This is KS test case issue. We are enabling the button on 'open' eventListeners -hence the flickering . Will fix in the next KS.
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
